revised_title: Large Elastic Deformations of Isotropic Materials: Further Developments of the General Theory
tldr: This article presents further developments in the general theory of large elastic deformations of isotropic materials. It discusses the stress-strain relationships, stored-energy functions, and equations of motion for both compressible and incompressible materials. The author also examines simple shear deformation and its effects on cuboids of compressible and incompressible materials.
